name: XCTPerformanceMeasurement
desc: A measurement from a single iteration of a performance test.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, doubleValue: Double, unitSymbol: String)
items.desc: Initializes a performance measurement for a single iteration with the value and unit of measurement.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, doubleValue: Double, unitSymbol: String, polarity: XCTPerformanceMeasurement.Polarity)
items.desc: Initializes a performance measurement for a single iteration with the value, unit of measurement, and polarity.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, value: Measurement<Unit>)
items.desc: Initializes a performance measurement for a single iteration with the value.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, value: Measurement<Unit>, polarity: XCTPerformanceMeasurement.Polarity)
items.desc: Initializes a performance measurement for a single iteration with the value and polarity.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: A human-readable name for a measurement.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A unique identifier for a measurement.

items.name: var unitSymbol: String
items.desc: A string that represents the unit of measurement.

items.name: var value: Measurement<Unit>
items.desc: The measured value, including the unit of measure.

items.name: var polarity: XCTPerformanceMeasurement.Polarity
items.desc: A constant that states whether larger or smaller measurements, relative to a set baseline, indicate better performance.

items.name: enum XCTPerformanceMeasurement.Polarity
items.desc: Constants that state whether larger or smaller measurements, relative to a set baseline, indicate better performance.
